title: Funnel Builder
job_overview:
You MUST have hands-on experience building funnels in Funnelish to apply.

About the Role:
We’re looking for a Funnelish Expert to design, tweak, and scale high-converting funnels using our platform. If you’ve built funnels in Funnelish before and know its quirks, workflows, and power features—we want you!

What You’ll Do:
Build & optimize Funnelish-specific funnels (lead magnets, sales pages, order bumps, etc.).
Leverage Funnelish’s native tools (no generic ClickFunnels/Kajabi experience—we need Funnelish pros).
Fix technical hiccups (integration snags, tracking issues, etc.) inside Funnelish.
Work with our team to A/B test and boost conversions.

Non-Negotiables:
You’ve built real funnels in Funnelish (share links or screenshots—no exceptions).
Deep knowledge of Funnelish’s features, limits, and best practices.
Obsessed with smooth UX, fast load times, and high conversions.
Self-motivated, detail-obsessed, and great at communicating.

How to Apply:
Fill out our Google Form (skip any section = instant rejection): Upgrade to see actual info
Prove your Funnelish experience (include funnel links or examples).
